channel.title: Lama Yeshe Wisdom Archive
channel.description: Bringing you teachings from great Tibetan lamas
channel.itunes:subtitle: Bringing you teachings from great Tibetan lamas
channel.itunes:summary: Listen to teachings from great Tibetan Buddhist masters Lama Thubten Yeshe and Lama Zopa Rinpoche. Visit our website (www.LamaYeshe.com) to read teachings from many of the greatest teachers of our time and to order our free books.

item.title: Three Principal Aspects of the Path: Part 1
item.description: Teachings found in the book "Essence of Tibetan Buddhism"
item.itunes:subtitle: Teachings found in the book "Essence of Tibetan Buddhism"
item.itunes:author: Lama Thubten Yeshe
item.itunes:summary: This teaching was given in France in 1982, during a tour of Europe by His Holiness the Dalai Lama. Just before His Holiness' scheduled teachings at Institut Vajra Yogini, His Holiness manifested illness and asked Lama Yeshe to fill in for a couple of days - to "baby-sit" the audience, as Lama put it. This wonderful two-part teaching is the result.

item.title: Three Principal Aspects of the Path: Part 2
item.description: Teachings found in the book "Essence of Tibetan Buddhism"
item.itunes:subtitle: Teachings found in the book "Essence of Tibetan Buddhism"
item.itunes:author: Lama Thubten Yeshe
item.itunes:summary: This teaching was given in France in 1982, during a tour of Europe by His Holiness the Dalai Lama. Just before His Holiness' scheduled teachings at Institut Vajra Yogini, His Holiness manifested illness and asked Lama Yeshe to fill in for a couple of days - to "baby-sit" the audience, as Lama put it. This wonderful two-part teaching is the result.

item.title: Introduction to Tantra: Part 1
item.description: Teachings found in the book "Essence of Tibetan Buddhism"
item.itunes:subtitle: Teachings found in the book "Essence of Tibetan Buddhism"
item.itunes:author: Lama Thubten Yeshe
item.itunes:summary: This two-part teaching was given in California in 1980. It comprises the first two lectures of a commentary on the Chenrezig yoga method taught by Lama Yeshe.

item.title: Introduction to Tantra: Part 2
item.description: Teachings found in the book "Essence of Tibetan Buddhism"
item.itunes:subtitle: Teachings found in the book "Essence of Tibetan Buddhism"
item.itunes:author: Lama Thubten Yeshe
item.itunes:summary: This two-part teaching was given in California in 1980. It comprises the first two lectures of a commentary on the Chenrezig yoga method taught by Lama Yeshe.

item.title: Teaching from the Mahamudra Retreat
item.description: One evening's teaching from the Mahamudra Retreat, Buddha House, Adelaide, Australia April-May 2004
item.itunes:subtitle: One evening's teaching from the Mahamudra Retreat, Buddha House, Adelaide, Australia April-May 2004
item.itunes:author: Lama Zopa Rinpoche
item.itunes:summary: Lama Zopa Rinpoche gave teachings throughout the two-month retreat. This teaching is from the evening of April 23, 2004 and covers a variety of topics.

item.description: Teachings on po-wa, the transference of consciousness at the time of death, given in London in September 1982

item.title: A Glimpse of Buddhist Psychology
item.description: This talk was given in Christchurch, New Zealand in June of 1975, and was published in Lama Yeshe's most popular title "Becoming Your Own Therapist"; read transcripts at http://www.lamayeshe.com/index.php?sect=article&id=68

item.title: Teachings from Barcelona: Day 1 Part 1
item.description: These teachings were given in Barcelona, Spain on the 2nd, 3rd and 4th of September 2005; this talk is excerpted from the first day. Hosted by the FPMT's Centro Nagarjuna ( http://www.nagarjunabcn.org ).

item.title: Talk at Center Opening: The Importance of Dharma Centers
item.description: This is a talk Lama Zopa Rinpoche gave at the opening of the new Vajrayana Institute in Sydney Australia in 2006, in which he talks extensively on the benefits of dharma centers.
